DataElement.preferredName: Image Positive Finding Lesion Clockface Hours Location Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The position of a positive finding in an image using the numbers on the face of a clock. [Manually-curated]

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A positive observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganismas a result of an imaging study.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:An observation confirming something, such as the
presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Property.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/6/12 jc  Add to ACRIN Image Finding CSI; remove from caBIG ACRIN CSI.  9/17/07 - released for reuse by C3PR.  3/20/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task; 3/14/07-updated for EVS term recommendation.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A location identifier based on clockface numbering or anatomic subregion._A position, site, or point in space where something can be found._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A location identifier based on clockface numbering or anatomic subregion.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A location identifier based on clockface numbering or anatomic subregion.
A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/1/07  Updated with CUI for clockface which was loaded to the caDSR.  3/20/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElement.changeDescription: 10/14/13 Removed caBIG-ACRIN CSI; added equivalent modality and Under Review ECOG-ACRIN CSI. jc  9/18/07 - released for reuse by C3PR.  3/26/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.
